casebody.data:
LOREDO
v.
CSX TRANSPORTATION
v.
Torres. No. 297A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2005. George B. Mast, David F. Mills, Bradley N. Schulz, Smithfield, for Loredo, Wood & Berkau. W.L. Allen, III, Greenville, Robert E. Ruegger, Raleigh, for Amelia Torres. Frank J. Gordon, Raleigh, for CXS Transportation, Inc. Patrick Flanagan, Charlotte, for Family Home & Garden & Horne.

AMENDED

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of November 2005 by Plaintiffs for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiffs (Loredo, Wood & Berkau and Amelia Torres) shall have up to and including the 21st day of November 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of November 2005."
